page.title: 07FARM SHOP
page.content: Stonelees Farm Bungalow is situated on the main Ramsgate-Sandwich Road. It is tucked away almost out of sight. It is owned by a couple who have lived in Cliffsend for twelve years. The products of the farm shop are as follows: {FRUITS: Vegetables {G/berries:25p 1lb Tomatoes:54p 1lb {Pears :28p each Beans :35p 1lb {Apricots :45p 1lb Carrots :30p 1lb {Plums :45p 1lb Peppers :75p 1lb {S/berries:50p 1lb Beetroot:28p 1lb {Cherries :60p 1lb ( prices at time {Peaches :12p each of survey July { 1985 ) These are just some of the many varieties of fruit and vegetables sold to passing traffic. There is a farm next to the shop which raises cattle and horses.
